etymology.description: 齊(齊) (qí, "together") originally depicted three rows of teeth -> borrowed phonetically for "together" meaning
etymology.interpretation: The character 齊(齊) (qí, "together") initially illustrated a concept of alignment or regularity, as symbolized by evenly positioned teeth. This imagery was later extended to denote harmony or unity, capturing the essence of coming together.
etymology.simplification: 齊(齊) simplified to 齐(齊) by reducing complex elements to a uniform, simpler form while retaining the phonetic core values.

examples.chinese: 我们齐心协力(我們齊心協力)，完成任务(完成任務)。
examples.english: We work together to complete the task.

examples.chinese: 朋友们齐聚一堂(朋友們齊聚一堂)，共享欢乐(共享歡樂)。
examples.pinyin: Péngyǒumen qí jù yītáng, gòngxiǎng huānlè.
examples.english: Friends gather together to share joy.

examples.chinese: 所有成员齐心前进(所有成員齊心前進)。
